original_title: Charlie Rich and Friends: Legends In Concert
overview: In this unforgettable television special, we have some of the finest performances by some of America's greatest country rock singers. Featuring 19 great songs by Charlie Rich and his friends. Charlie's charm and unique country-rock sound helps to make this an epic performance to watch. Nicknamed 'The Silver Fox' due to his unique charm, Charlie performs hits such as 'Big Boss Man,' 'Let's Take It Nice And Easy' and 'Behind Closed Doors.'
tagline: Charlie Rich and Friends: Legends In Concert
title: Charlie Rich and Friends: Legends In Concert
